item.title: About
item.description: Innotro is an IT consulting firm registered in England and Wales. Areas of Expertise: Custom software design and development Cloud based solutions Microservices For any business inquiry please send an email to info at [innotro] dot com.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Welcome to Innotro’s blog. My name is Mo Asgari and in this blog, I will write about software development, microservices, AWS services, and DevOps.
